quote: Loneliness is my least favorite thing about life. The thing that I'm most worried about is just being alone without anybody to care for or someone who will care for me.
author: Anne Hathaway

quote: Loneliness adds beauty to life. It puts a special burn on sunsets and makes night air smell better.
author: Henry Rollins

quote: I used to think the worst thing in life was to end up all alone. It’s not. The worst thing in life is to end up with people that make you feel all alone.
author: Robin Williams

quote: Death is not the opposite of life, but a part of it.
author: Haruki Murakami

quote: The fear of death follows from the fear of life. A man who lives fully is prepared to die at any time.
author: Mark Twain

quote: It is not length of life, but depth of life.
author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quote: Death ends a life, not a relationship.
author: Mitch Albom

quote: The life of the dead is placed in the memory of the living.
author: Marcus Tullius Cicero

quote: For life and death are one, even as the river and the sea are one.
author: Khalil Gibran

quote: Even for me life had its gleams of sunshine.
author: Charlotte Brontë

quote: You can love them, forgive them, want good things for them… but still move on without them.
author: Mandy Hale

quote: The hottest love has the coldest end.
author: Socrates

quote: It’s hard to move on when you’re still in love with the other person.
author: Anonymous

quote: I was born when you kissed me. I died when you left me. I lived a few weeks while you loved me.
author: Humphrey Bogart

quote: Death leaves a heartache no one can heal, love leaves a memory no one can steal.
author: Unknown

quote: Jealousy, that dragon which slays love under the pretense of keeping it alive.
author: Havelock Ellis

quote: Divorce is simply the legal separation of two people who no longer love each other.
author: Unknown

quote: A successful marriage requires falling in love many times, always with the same person.
author: Mignon McLaughlin

quote: Missing someone is your heart’s way of reminding you that you love them.
author: Unknown

quote: Absence from whom we love is worse than death, and frustrates hope severer than despair.
author: William Cowper

quote: Success is not final, failure is not fatal: It is the courage to continue that counts.
author: Winston Churchill

quote: Success is not for the lazy. No more excuses.
author: Unknown

quote: Failure is the condiment that gives success its flavor.
author: Truman Capote

quote: It's fine to celebrate success, but it is more important to heed the lessons of failure.
author: Bill Gates

quote: Failure is success in progress.
author: Albert Einstein

quote: Your positive action combined with positive thinking results in success.
author: Shiv Khera

quote: Discipline is the foundation upon which all success is built.
author: Jim Rohn

quote: I possess the qualities needed to be extremely successful.
author: Unknown

quote: To be successful, you have to have your heart in your business, and your business in your heart.
author: Thomas Watson Sr.

quote: The only way to do great work is to love what you do.
author: Steve Jobs

quote: Don't watch the clock; do what it does. Keep going.
author: Sam Levenson

quote: Keep your face always toward the sunshine—and shadows will fall behind you.
author: Walt Whitman

quote: Success is not the key to happiness. Happiness is the key to success. If you love what you are doing, you will be successful.
author: Albert Schweitzer

quote: The harder the battle, the sweeter the victory.
author: Les Brown

quote: Don't stop when you're tired. Stop when you're done.
author: Unknown

quote: The future belongs to those who believe in the beauty of their dreams.
author: Eleanor Roosevelt

quote: Believe you can and you're halfway there.
author: Theodore Roosevelt

quote: It does not matter how slowly you go as long as you do not stop.
author: Confucius

quote: You are never too old to set another goal or to dream a new dream.
author: C.S. Lewis

quote: Act as if what you do makes a difference. It does.
author: William James

quote: Success is not final, failure is not fatal: It is the courage to continue that counts.
author: Winston Churchill

quote: You miss 100% of the shots you don't take.
author: Wayne Gretzky

quote: Hardships often prepare ordinary people for an extraordinary destiny.
author: C.S. Lewis

quote: What lies behind us and what lies before us are tiny matters compared to what lies within us.
author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quote: Sometimes, you need to be alone. Not to be lonely, but to enjoy your free time being yourself.
author: Anonymous

quote: The pain of parting is nothing to the joy of meeting again.
author: Charles Dickens

quote: Half of all marriages end in divorce—and then there are the really unhappy ones.
author: Joan Rivers

quote: Sometimes you need to be alone. Not to be lonely, but to enjoy your free time being yourself.
author: Unknown

quote: Happiness is not something ready made. It comes from your own actions.
author: Dalai Lama

quote: Happiness is not something ready made. It comes from your own actions.
author: Dalai Lama

quote: If you want to be happy, be.
author: Leo Tolstoy

quote: Happiness is not by chance, but by choice.
author: Jim Rohn

quote: Happiness depends upon ourselves.
author: Aristotle

quote: For every minute you are angry, you lose sixty seconds of happiness.
author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quote: The best way to cheer yourself up is to try to cheer somebody else up.
author: Mark Twain

quote: The best way to predict the future is to create it.
author: Peter Drucker

quote: You must be the change you wish to see in the world.
author: Mahatma Gandhi

quote: In the end, we will remember not the words of our enemies, but the silence of our friends.
author: Martin Luther King Jr.

quote: Do not wait to strike till the iron is hot, but make it hot by striking.
author: William Butler Yeats

quote: The only limit to our realization of tomorrow is our doubts of today.
author: Franklin D. Roosevelt

quote: The only way to achieve the impossible is to believe it is possible.
author: Charles Kingsleigh

quote: You are never too old to set another goal or to dream a new dream.
author: C.S. Lewis

quote: We are what we repeatedly do. Excellence, then, is not an act, but a habit.
author: Aristotle

quote: The only thing standing between you and your goal is the story you keep telling yourself as to why you can’t achieve it.
author: Jordan Belfort

quote: Success is not final, failure is not fatal: It is the courage to continue that counts.
author: Winston Churchill

quote: A friendship that can end never really began.
author: Publilius Syrus

quote: The most beautiful discovery true friends make is that they can grow separately without growing apart.
author: Elisabeth Foley

quote: The loss of a friend is like that of a limb; time may heal the anguish of the wound, but the loss cannot be repaired.
author: Robert Southey

quote: True friendship is like sound health; the value of it is seldom known until it is lost.
author: Charles Caleb Colton

quote: The death of a friend is equivalent to the loss of a limb.
author: German Proverb

quote: Good friends are hard to find, harder to leave, and impossible to forget.
author: Unknown

quote: Losing a friend is like losing your soul.
author: Unknown

quote: Wear a smile and have friends; wear a scowl and have wrinkles.
author: George Eliot

quote: A person can rise through the efforts of his own mind; or draw himself down, in the same manner. Because each person is his own friend or enemy.
author: Bhagavad Gita

quote: Silence is a true friend who never betrays.
author: Confucius

quote: I'm not arguing, I'm just explaining why I'm right.
author: Unknown

quote: I am so clever that sometimes I don't understand a single word of what I am saying.
author: Oscar Wilde

quote: People say nothing is impossible, but I do nothing every day.
author: A. A. Milne

quote: I refuse to join any club that would have me as a member.
author: Groucho Marx

quote: The only mystery in life is why the kamikaze pilots wore helmets.
author: Al McGuire

quote: My fake plants died because I did not pretend to water them.
author: Mitch Hedberg

quote: I find television very educating. Every time somebody turns on the set, I go into the other room and read a book.
author: Groucho Marx

quote: Behind every great man is a woman rolling her eyes.
author: Jim Carrey

quote: The difference between stupidity and genius is that genius has its limits.
author: Albert Einstein

quote: Light travels faster than sound. This is why some people appear bright until you hear them speak.
author: Alan Dundes
